question: Write a letter to your friend who is starting an import/export business and asked you for recommendation for a product from your own country.In the letter, you should:- what the product will be- from which region of your country where it came from- why it is a good product to export.
text: Thank you for writing me a letter out of your busy schedule. Congratulations on your first business model and I'll be delighted to be of some assistance.

The last December, do you remember that I invited you to my birthday party and you stayed at my place until the new year, I took you to a beautiful place which has a coffee shop there? When we went there you found the fragrance of coffee quite sweet and nice, which we ordered and you find it delicious. I think this coffee can add great value to your importing/exporting business. I have done  thorough research about it.

This tea is called Herbal Green coffee and it comes in seven different flavours out of which honey ginger is quite popular. This comes from a southern part of China and it has the most shelf life out of its other variants. This product also has some nutritional value added to it, which can help in increasing your customer base and thus increasing your sales and establishing your business in the market.

This product is used for medicinal purposes as well as recreational purposes. Many doctors, nutritionists, yoga practitioners recommend this coffee to their clients and also incorporate it into their practice as well.
I hope my suggestions are of some assistance.
